tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NanoparticleSamples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50),
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  diameter FLOAT,
  material_composition VARCHAR(100),
  surface_area FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE nanoparticle_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    particle_size FLOAT,
    material_composition TEXT,
    classification_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_value TEXT,
    sample_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES nanoparticle_samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE nanoparticle_samples (
	sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sample_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	particle_size FLOAT NOT NULL,
	particle_shape TEXT,
	material_composition TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sample_properties (
	sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	density FLOAT NOT NULL,
	color TEXT,
	transparency TEXT,
	magnetism BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE sample_comparison (
	comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sample_id_1 INT NOT NULL,
	sample_id_2 INT NOT NULL,
	comparison_result TEXT,
	comparison_date DATE
);
